name: Paint Puzzle!
description:
Awaken your inner artist in Paint Puzzle! It’s your job to fill the canvas with the right colors and complete the painting.

Stay focused though as the colors are limited! Sometimes you’ll need to use your brush to mix the paints together and get the correct color combination. Can you remember how to make purple? Green? Orange? There’s a handy mug to clean your brush as you work, but once you’ve changed the color of the paint there’s no going back!

With loads of fun levels, cute animations and satisfying scenes to paint, you can let your creative juices run wild with Paint Puzzle!
